ygData.subject: RE: Lookin fer fletchie kit in Grobb
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually I believe there is an ogre in the feerot who sells fletching kits... Just go to the bridge on the oggok side and head right until you reach a small
ygData.messageBody:
Actually I believe there is an ogre in the feerot who sells fletching
kits... Just go to the bridge on the oggok side and head right until you
reach a small ogre camp. An ogre female sells all sorts of fletching stuff
and I believe a kit as well. However this is what I think as I have never
really checked, try it out and tell me.


>From: "Jeremy Pollack" <jpollack@...>
>Reply-To: shadowknight@onelist.com
>To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
>Subject: RE: [shadowknight] Lookin fer fletchie kit in Grobb
>Date: Tue, 21 Sep 1999 13:52:39 -0400
>
>From: "Jeremy Pollack" <jpollack@...>
>
>The closest place to get fletchie kits, my green friend, is to travel to
>the
>Centaur Camp in the southern plains of Karana. It is a large place but if
>you travel north and east until you near the river you will find it. Beware
>of the aviaks that inhabit this realm however as they do not like trolls
>for
>some odd reason. I'm not sure if it has anything to do with the fact that
>when you are older you will eat them or not? Anyways, if get to the river,
>you've gone too far (loc of camp is 200, -2300 because I know how much of a
>pain in the arse it can be to find). The fletchie kits should be around 1
>plat or 2 (probably closer to 2 for you, my charismatic friend). The
>Centaur
>has a name and is in one of the four centaur houses there. He also sells
>equipment for bowyery for when you decide to take up that trade.
>
>Good luck to you large one
>
>May His Hate make you Strong
>
>Virten, Knight of Innoruuk
>
>

>-= Support Evil Roleplaying =-
